医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
开发出用于胎儿 DNA 测序的非侵入性基因测试来自麻省总医院 (MGH)、布莱根妇女医院 (BWH) 以及麻省理工学院和哈佛大学博德研究所的一组研究人员开发了一种非侵入性基因测试，可以筛查怀孕个体的血液，以调查胎儿的所有基因DNA 序列变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Non-induced-genic-test-for-fetal-DNA-sequencing-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Non-induced-genic-test-for-fetal-DNA-sequencing-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d6129c6-b1c3-475e-9d97-2632bad4b10f Wed, 22 Nov 2023 21:15:29 -0500 Non-invasive genetic test for fetal DNA sequencing developed
单次注射新型水凝胶可以取代每周一次的糖尿病注射斯坦福大学的材料工程师开发了一种新型水凝胶药物输送系统，将每日或每周注射糖尿病和体重控制药物（如 Ozempic、Mounjaro、Trulicity、Victoza 等）改为每四个月注射一次。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Single-injection-of-novel-Hydrogel-could-replace-weekly-diabetes-injections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Single-injection-of-novel-Hydrogel-could-replace-weekly-diabetes-injections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a543ffe1-abb8-435c-b932-5b81f6aa6187 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 20:43:49 -0500 Single injection of novel hydrogel could replace weekly diabetes injections
黑人孕妇面临多种心理健康问题的高风险波士顿学院威廉·F·康奈尔护理学院教授苏珊·根纳罗 (Susan Gennaro) 博士、注册护士、FAAN 及其《护士从业者》杂志的同事发表的研究结果表明，黑人孕妇经常会遇到不止一种心理健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Black-pregnant-individuals-at-high-risk-for-multiple-mental-health-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Black-pregnant-individuals-at-high-risk-for-multiple-mental-health-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af16116d-7c5a-4428-bd1b-c2fb5d2c6b1f Wed, 22 Nov 2023 20:33:28 -0500 Black pregnant individuals at high risk for multiple mental health concerns
研究发现常见皮肤细菌是此前未知的瘙痒罪魁祸首哈佛医学院的科学家首次证明，一种常见的皮肤细菌 -；金黄色葡萄球菌 -;可以通过直接作用于神经细胞引起瘙痒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Study-identizes-common-skin-bacter-as-previously-unknown-culprit-behind-itch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Study-identizes-common-skin-bacter-as-previously-unknown-culprit-behind-itch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80b38360-569a-412d-beca-f569d8b1e411 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 20:23:44 -0500 Study identifies common skin bacterium as previously unknown culprit behind itch
揭示白血病细胞的遗传脆弱性白血病是儿童中最常见的癌症类型。治疗涉及强化化疗，由于其非特异性作用模式，具有严重的副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Genetic-vulnerability-of-leukemia-cells-uncovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Genetic-vulnerability-of-leukemia-cells-uncovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88d46fb9-4eb2-4076-b8e3-51a976729a12 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 19:48:07 -0500 Genetic vulnerability of leukemia cells uncovered
针对线粒体的抗生素可能会延长寿命一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志上（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 21 期，题为“Antibiotics that target线粒体延长 C 中的寿命” .线虫。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Antibiotics-that-target-mitochondria-may-promote-longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Antibiotics-that-target-mitochondria-may-promote-longevity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e56062f3-d2cb-474c-a155-4fdf50700ab6 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 19:29:27 -0500 Antibiotics that target mitochondria may promote longevity
COVID-19 大流行与年轻人骨矿物质密度显着下降有关《美国人类生物学杂志》上发表的一项研究结果表明，COVID-19 大流行对骨组织产生了负面影响，包括前臂的骨矿物质密度和总骨矿物质含量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/COVID-19-pandemic-linked-to-significant-bone-mineral-密度-decrease-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/COVID-19-pandemic-linked-to-significant-bone-mineral-密度-decrease-in-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de12fbb4-61a3-4463-990d-82a5bc607d74 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 19:16:03 -0500 COVID-19 pandemic linked to significant bone mineral density decrease in young adults
干细胞移植治疗膝骨关节炎被证明是安全有效的细胞疗法代表了骨关节炎的潜在再生疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Stem-cell-transplantation-proves-to-be-safe-and- effective-for-knee-osteoarthritis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Stem-cell-transplantation-proves-to-be-safe-and- effective-for-knee-osteoarthritis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b64b831-a036-45bf-9c0c-640024c740ec Wed, 22 Nov 2023 19:10:19 -0500 Stem cell transplantation proves to be safe and effective for knee osteoarthritis treatment
宇宙辐射和微重力与宇航员勃起功能障碍有关在执行太空任务期间，宇航员会暴露在高水平的银河宇宙辐射和失重状态下。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Cosmic-radiation-and-microgravity-linked-to-erectile-dysfunction-in-astronauts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Cosmic-radiation-and-microgravity-linked-to-erectile-dysfunction-in-astronauts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5c2ef89-ea3c-4b95-8858-ad56cc71d160 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 19:05:08 -0500 Cosmic radiation and microgravity linked to erectile dysfunction in astronauts
大脑的声刺激可以缓解轻度脑外伤后的持续症状新的研究表明，对大脑进行声刺激可以缓解过去经历过轻度创伤性脑损伤的个体的持续症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Acoustic-stimulation-of-the-brain-may-ease-persistent-symptoms-after-mild-traumatic-brain-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Acoustic-stimulation-of-the-brain-may-ease-persistent-symptoms-after-mild-traumatic-brain-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=731ba91f-a701-465d-b2e0-b0b1c5af4a5c Wed, 22 Nov 2023 18:59:39 -0500 Acoustic stimulation of the brain may ease persistent symptoms after mild traumatic brain injury
